parameter.name: id
parameter.description: If included, searches for customers with the given unique ID. The id option cannot be used with the code or email options.

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: If included, searches for customers with the given customer code. The code option cannot be used with id or email options.

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: If included, searches for customers with the given email address. This is an exact match search. The email option cannot be used with the id or code options.

parameter.name: since
parameter.description: If included, searches for customers modified since the given time. The provided date and time should be in UTC and formatted according to ISO 8601.
